name: The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai: Across the Eighth Dimension
name_original: The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai: Across the Eighth Dimension
description:
The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai: Across the Eighth Dimension is an adventure game. It was originally released in 1985. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai: Across the Eighth Dimension is available on PC.
